data.eml:eml: A new striking and critically endangered species of Nasa (Loasaceae, Cornales) from North Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Henning, Tilo, Acuna Castillo, Rafael, Rodriguez Rodriguez, Eric Frank, Garcia Llatas, Luis Felipe, Weigend, Maximilian (2019): A new striking and critically endangered species of Nasa (Loasaceae, Cornales) from North Peru. PhytoKeys 121: 13-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.121.33927, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.121.33927
